column4: i need some ubuntu help! i'm sick of setting up my secondary monitor every time the computer starts, this is my xorg.conf: http://pastebin.com/CtBUrieM   it doesn't look right at all o.O  and whenever i use nvidia-settings manager to set it up it's telling me theres an error with my xorg.conf (ran from console this is the error: http://pastebin.com/TQCqSkD5 )
anybody can point me in the right direction it'd be greatly appreciated ^^ :)
